ch0178_00_lira/0101_0701_01_10:
I have been waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0178_00_lira/0101_0701_02_10:
We hope you cooperate with us—the International
Police—again today.
ch0178_00_lira/7101_0701_01_10:
My duty is to investigate Ultra Beasts and protect
the people from any threat they may pose.
ch0178_00_lira/7101_0701_02_10:
I am permitted to destroy them all, but Ultra Beasts
are also living creatures.
ch0178_00_lira/7101_0701_03_10:
I would like to protect and save them as
much as possible.
ch0178_00_lira/7102_0701_01_10:
In Alola and Kalos, there are restaurants where
you can have Pokémon battles.
ch0178_00_lira/7102_0701_02_10:
Don’t you think battling and feasting at the same
time is the finest luxury?
ch0178_00_lira/7103_0701_01_10:
A lot of people gather together around tourist
spots like Pasio.
ch0178_00_lira/7103_0701_02_10:
Bad people may be hiding around places like that,
so please be careful.
ch0178_00_lira/7104_0701_01_10:
Looker is in a class of his own, even within the
elite members of the International Police.
ch0178_00_lira/7104_0701_02_10:
*chuckle* Were you surprised? I suppose he is
usually quite down-to-earth.
ch0178_00_lira/7104_0701_03_10:
I would never have expected someone like him to
serve under my command...
ch0178_00_lira/7105_0701_01_10:
By the way, have you already tried the Battle Villa
on Pasio?
ch0178_00_lira/7105_0701_02_10:
I believe with your potential, you should be able
to get good results, don’t you think?
ch0178_00_lira/7105_0701_03_10:
I am very curious to see what kind of tactics you
use in battle.
ch0178_00_lira/1701_0701_01_10:
Perfect timing. There is something I want to
give you.
ch0178_00_lira/1701_0702_01_10:
This is to express my gratitude for your
continued cooperation.
ch0178_00_lira/2501_0701_01_10:
On my days off, I go to Pokémon battle facilities
to challenge myself.
ch0178_00_lira/2501_0701_02_10: But I don’t just have fun, you know?
ch0178_00_lira/2501_0701_03_10:
Once you lose, that is it. I follow this rule, and it
helps me exercise good decision-making.
ch0178_00_lira/2501_0701_04_10: No failure is allowed with my duties.
ch0178_00_lira/2501_0702_01_10:
Is it too serious and overbearing to think about
work on my day off?
ch0178_00_lira/2501_0702_02_10: Staying alert all the time can get tiring.
ch0178_00_lira/2501_0702_03_10:
Well then, please tell me where I can go on Pasio
to have a nice break.
ch0178_00_lira/2511_0701_01_10:
I lost my memory and was taken into custody by
the International Police.
ch0178_00_lira/2511_0701_02_10:
Mr. Nanu took really good care of me... Thanks to
him, I am who I am now.
ch0178_00_lira/2511_0701_03_10:
Mr. Nanu will never admit it, but he is an
amazing person.
ch0178_00_lira/2511_0702_01_10: I wish someday to regain my memory...
ch0178_00_lira/2511_0702_02_10:
I cannot remember now, but...there must be
people who took good care of me—and both
people and Pokémon I cared about a lot.
ch0178_00_lira/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. I’m about to head out on my
morning rounds. Would you care to join me?
ch0178_00_lira/3003_0701_01_10:
Are you hungry? If you want some help finding a
restaurant with good food, I’m more than willing
to open an investigation.
ch0178_00_lira/3005_0701_01_10:
The International Police recommends traveling
with your Pokémon when you’re out and about
at night.
